comment.author: 67587725@N02
comment._content: This is the junction of  Lutton Place and St Leonard's Street.    OS 1893 confirms house and staircase. Castle o Clouts can be seen on the right edge of the photograph.

comment.author: 67587725@N02
comment._content: The brick wall showing the outline of a bricked up door on the left edge of the photograph is still there today, as is the stone wall which is hidden behind the wooden fence.   The building showing above would have extended over today's pavement.  Fascinating these clues are still with us today especially the brick wall!
